verses.verse: Then answered <WH6030> Bildad <WH1085> the Shuhite <WH7747>, and said <WH559>,
Dominion <WH4910> and fear <WH6343> are with him, he maketh <WH6213> peace <WH7965> in his high places <WH4791>.
Is there <WH3426> any number <WH4557> of his armies <WH1416>? and upon whom doth not his light <WH216> arise <WH6965>?
How then can man <WH582> be justified <WH6663> with God <WH410>? or how can he be clean <WH2135> that is born <WH3205> of a woman <WH802>?
Behold even to the moon <WH3394>, and it shineth <WH166> not; yea, the stars <WH3556> are not pure <WH2141> in his sight <WH5869>.
How much less man <WH582>, that is a worm <WH7415>? and the son <WH1121> of man <WH120>, which is a worm <WH8438>?
